text: @realDonaldTrump Somebodys(@realDonaldTrump) scared of @JoeBiden! Or why else would he want to be running against @BernieSanders! He knows its the only chance he had & even at that it wasnt a good shot! People are just sick of ur BullShat these days,& ur response to Covid-19 sealed ur fate!
